name: Spelling Chaos
description:
--------------------------------------------------

For Brackeys Game Jam 2021

------------------------------------------------------------

*Project is a work in progress*

Thrown into the arena by the King himself, survive the waves of enemies thrown at you with nothing but your spells. Wreak havoc to your hearts content. But do be forewarned, as your spells can take awhile before they are back up, what will you do then? Good luck brave wizard~

------------------------------------------------------------

Programmers: Ayden & Lowliet

3D Artist/Animation: ComfyCauldron

Music: Iskold Person
